p: Twenty-one 8-week-old female C57BL/6 mice average weight 20 ± 2.5 g were used in this study. The animals were obtained as a gift from Dr. Hamza Hanie, animal facility, College of Science, King Faisal University. Mice were housed in the air-conditioned animal house, a 12-hour light/12-hour dark cycle, adjusted at 22°C ± 1°C temperature. During the study periods, all animals were fed a standard rat diet.
